dt-api.name: autoFill().enabled()
dt-api.summary: Determine if AutoFill is enabled or disabled

type.name: autoFill().enabled()
type.description: This method will return a boolean value indicating if AutoFill is enabled or not on the selected table.

dt-api.description: This method can be used to determine if the AutoFill extension for a DataTable is enabled on a table or not. A simple boolean value is given indicating the status.

example.title: Toggle the enabled state of AutoFill on a button click
